#summary What you need to install DiaporamCenter

*Operating System*
 * Windows XP SP2
 * Windows Vista
 * Windows 7
with Internet Explorer 6, 7, or 8 installed

*Minimum Hardware*
 * 800 MHz Pentium III or Athlon
 * 256 MB RAM 
 * 25 MB hard drive space

Note: an internet connection is recommended, since diaporamas can download content from a web site.
